instruction: Find a paper list of all the new foundation language models issued on 11st Oct. 2023 via arxiv daily, and organize it into the sheet I opened.

minimal: SCROLL to find papers issued on 2023-10-11
CLICK on relevant papers to open in new tabs
TYPING Extract paper title, arxiv PDF link, and date for each foundation model paper
HOTKEY'Ctrl+Tab' to switch to LibreOffice Calc
TYPING Paste each [paper title, arxiv link, date] into the corresponding row
batched: SCROLL to find papers issued on 2023-10-11
CLICK on relevant papers to open in new tabs
TYPING Extract paper title, arxiv PDF link, and date for each foundation model paper
HOTKEY'Ctrl+Tab' to switch to LibreOffice Calc
TYPING Paste each [paper title, arxiv link, date] into the corresponding row
